text: hananim-ui tteus-i iss-eo indohagoja haneun jaleul wihaeseoneun geudeul-ui gaseum-eul iseullam-elo yeol-eoss-eumyeo geubun ui tteus-i iss-eo banghwangke hagoja haneun jaleul wihaeseoneun geudeul-ui gaseum-eul job ge hasini ineun geudeul-i haneul-e o leuneun geosgwa gatdeola ileohdeus hananim eun mid-eum-eul geoyeoghaneun ideul wie beol eul naelisim-ila
